header.slogan: Edit, convert and sign PDFs in seconds. No signup, no payment, no watermarks. Completely free and unlimited for everyone.

merge.name: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single ordered document.

split.name: Split PDF
split.description: Extract specific pages or split your document into multiple parts.

compress.name: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce file size while maintaining the best possible quality.

rotate.name: Rotate PDF
rotate.description: Rotate your PDF pages. Save permanently right now.

delete.name: Delete Pages
delete.description: Remove unwanted pages from your PDF document.

reorder.name: Reorder
reorder.description: Organize your PDF pages by simply dragging and dropping.

pdf-to-image.name: PDF to Image
pdf-to-image.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG or PNG images.

image-to-pdf.name: Image to PDF
image-to-pdf.description: Convert your images (JPG, PNG) to PDF files.

watermark.name: Watermark
watermark.description: Add text or image watermark to your PDF.

protect.name: Protect PDF
protect.description: Add password and encrypt your important PDF files.
protect.title: Protect PDF with Password
protect.subtitle: Secure your PDF with encryption and permissions
protect.userPasswordDesc: Required to open the PDF document
protect.ownerPasswordWarning: Owner password must be different from user password
protect.encryptionInfo: Higher encryption provides better security but may have compatibility issues with older PDF readers

errors.noPassword: Please set at least one password
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordsSame: Owner password must be different from user password

toasts.successDesc: Your encrypted PDF has been downloaded.
toasts.errorDesc: An error occurred while protecting the PDF

unlock.name: Unlock PDF
unlock.description: Remove password and protection from PDF files.
unlock.title: Unlock PDF
unlock.subtitle: Remove password protection and restrictions from your PDF files
unlock.passwordNote: Note: You must provide the correct password to unlock the document. We cannot crack unknown passwords.
unlock.supportNote: We support removing owner passwords and user passwords if you know them.

toasts.error: Failed to unlock PDF. Please check the password.

landing.heroDescription: Edit, convert and sign PDFs in seconds. No signup, no payment, no watermarks. Completely free and unlimited for everyone.
landing.powerfulToolsDescription: Choose the ideal tool for your needs
landing.featuresDescription: Our platform offers advanced features that were previously only available in expensive and complex software.

footer.description: The best online platform to manage your PDF documents quickly and securely.

messages.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only {{types}} are allowed

split.selectionHelp: Click pages on the right to select explicitly for extraction.
split.pageRangeHelp: Enter page numbers and/or ranges separated by commas.
split.splitEveryHelp: The PDF will be broken into chunks of {{count}} pages.
split.individualHelp: Every single page will be saved as a separate PDF file.
split.error: An error occurred while splitting the PDF.
split.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one page.
split.invalidRange: Invalid range or no pages in range.

compress.title: Smart PDF Compression
compress.subtitle: Intelligent optimization that preserves legibility.
compress.textHeavyDesc: Contains mostly searchable text. Aggressive compression may affect clarity.
compress.imageRichDesc: Contains mostly images. Good candidate for compression.
compress.optimizationLimitedDesc: This PDF was already compressed. File size reduction is minimal.
compress.analysisCompleteDesc: We detected some constraints with this file.

You are about to delete {count} pages. The resulting PDF will have {remaining} pages.
This action cannot be undone on the saved file.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At PDF Master, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our PDF editing application.
privacy.completeProcessing: All PDF operations are performed entirely in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
privacy.noUpload: We do not upload your files to any server
privacy.noStore: We do not store your files
privacy.noAccess: We do not access the content of your documents
privacy.localProcessing: All processing happens locally on your device
privacy.minimalAnalytics: We may collect minimal analytics data to improve our service:
privacy.noPersonalData: We never collect file names, file contents, or any personal information from your documents.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use minimal cookies for essential functionality and analytics.
privacy.seeCookiePolicy: See our Cookie Policy for details.
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We may use the following third-party services:
privacy.vercelAnalytics: Vercel Analytics: For anonymous usage statistics
privacy.googleFonts: Google Fonts: For typography (loaded from Google's CDN)
privacy.securityDesc: Since all processing happens in your browser, your files are as secure as your device. We recommend:
privacy.upToDate: Ensuring your device has up-to-date security software
privacy.noPublic: Not using public computers for sensitive documents
privacy.rightsDesc: Since we don't store your data, there's nothing to delete or modify. However, you can:
privacy.clearCache: Clear your browser cache and cookies at any time
privacy.childrenDesc: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by the "Last updated" date at the top of this page.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.acceptanceDesc: By accessing and using PDF Master, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.serviceIntro: PDF Master is a free, browser-based PDF editing tool that allows you to:
terms.editMerge: Edit, merge, split, and compress PDF files
terms.convert: Convert between PDF and image formats
terms.useIntro: You agree to use this service:
terms.accordance: In accordance with these Terms of Use
terms.noViolate: Without violating any applicable laws or regulations
terms.noInfringe: Without infringing on the rights of others
terms.ipDesc: You retain all rights to the documents you process using PDF Master. We do not claim any ownership over your files or their contents.
terms.copyrightDesc: The PDF Master software, design, and user interface are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.disclaimerIntro: PDF Master is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee:
terms.noInterruption: That the service will be uninterrupted or error-free
terms.noVirus: That the service is free of viruses or harmful components
terms.noAccuracy: The accuracy or reliability of any results
terms.limitationDesc: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terms.deviceSecurity: The security of your device and browser
terms.backups: Backing up important documents before processing
terms.verifyOutput: Verifying the output of any operations
terms.rightToModify: Ensuring you have the right to modify any documents you process
terms.modificationsDesc: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time without notice. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the service.
terms.lawDesc: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Brazil, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.changesDesc: We may revise these terms at any time. The revised terms will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the service after any changes indicates your acceptance of the new terms.
terms.contactDesc: For questions about these Terms of Use, please contact:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatDesc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
cookies.howDesc: PDF Master uses cookies for the following purposes:
cookies.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly
cookies.preference: Preference Cookies: Remember your settings (like theme preference)
cookies.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
cookies.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences or language selection.
cookies.analyticsDesc: We use Vercel Analytics to collect anonymous usage data. This helps us understand:
cookies.navigation: How users navigate through the site
cookies.preferenceDesc: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as theme or language) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.
cookies.thirdPartyIntro: We may use third-party services that set cookies, including:
cookies.googleFonts: Google Fonts: For typography (may set cookies)
cookies.managingIntro: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can:
cookies.deleteAll: Delete all cookies that are already on your device
cookies.preventCookies: Set your browser to prevent cookies from being placed
cookies.browserExt: Use browser extensions to block specific types of cookies
cookies.disableWarning: If you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly.
cookies.durationDesc: We use both session cookies (which expire when you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your device for a set period or until you delete them).
cookies.updatesDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
cookies.seePrivacy: For more information about how we handle your data, please see our Privacy Policy.
cookies.contactDesc: If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or need support? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.devDesc: PDF Master is developed and maintained by Edilson Rogério Cuambe, a passionate developer dedicated to creating useful, privacy-focused tools.
contact.openSource: This project is open-source and welcomes contributions from the community. If you'd like to contribute, check out our GitHub repository.
contact.faqFreeAnswer: Yes! PDF Master is completely free with no hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium features.
contact.faqSafeAnswer: Absolutely. All processing happens locally in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
contact.faqCommercial: Can I use this for commercial purposes?
contact.faqCommercialAnswer: Yes, you can use PDF Master for both personal and commercial purposes at no cost.
contact.faqBug: How can I report a bug?
contact.faqBugAnswer: Please open an issue on our GitHub Issues page or email us directly.
contact.faqFeatureAnswer: Of course! We welcome feature suggestions. Please share them via GitHub Issues or email.
contact.businessDesc: While PDF Master is available 24/7, support inquiries are typically responded to within 1-2 business days.
contact.personalProject: Please note: This is a personal project maintained in my free time, so response times may vary.
